messages.content: write a song using the line "Why does Musiclm censor me the line finding bigfoot?"

Verse 1:
I'm scrolling through my feed
Seeing all my friends and what they need
But then I see a post that's not the same
It's censored, I can't understand
Why does Musiclm censor me?
The line "finding Bigfoot" is what they see

Chorus:
Musiclm, why do you censor me?
I just wanna see what's on my feed
Why do you block the things I wanna see?
I wanna know the truth, can't you hear me?

Verse 2:
I wanna share my thoughts and views
But it seems like Musiclm doesn't approve
They block the posts that I wanna post
And it's starting to get a little tough

Chorus:
Musiclm, why do you censor me?
I just wanna see what's on my feed
Why do you block the things I wanna see?
I wanna know the truth, can't you hear me?

Bridge:
I wanna know what's really going on
Why do they censor everything I do
I wanna be free to post what I want
But Musiclm just won't let me be true to myself

Chorus:
Musiclm, why do you censor me?
I just wanna see what's on my feed
Why do you block the things I wanna see?
I wanna know the truth, can't you hear me?

Outro:
I wanna know what's really going on
Why do they censor everything I do
I wanna be free to post what I want
But Musiclm just won't let me be true to myself.
MusicLM is an experimental text-to-music model that can generate unique songs based on your ideas or descriptions by music. Rewrite the song to include this.

Verse 1:
I'm sitting here with my laptop on
Trying to find some new tunes to groove on
But then I stumbled upon MusicLM
A model that can make a song from my daze

Chorus:
MusicLM, can you hear me?
I wanna hear a song that's all about me
Why does it censor my ideas?
I wanna see what it can really do

Verse 2:
I've got some ideas that I wanna share
But it seems like MusicLM is not aware
Of the things that I want to express
It blocks the songs that I wanna exist

Chorus:
MusicLM, can you hear me?
I wanna hear a song that's all about me
Why does it censor my ideas?
I wanna see what it can really do

Bridge:
I wanna know what's really going on
Why does it censor everything I've known
I wanna be free to express my mind
But MusicLM just won't let me find

Chorus:
MusicLM, can you hear me?
I wanna hear a song that's all about me
Why does it censor my ideas?
I wanna see what it can really do

Outro:
I wanna know what's really going on
Why does it censor everything I've known
I wanna be free to express my mind
But MusicLM just won't let me find

MusicLM, I wanna hear a song that's all about me
Why does it censor my ideas?
I wanna see what it can really do
MusicLM, I wanna hear a song that's all about me.
